Comment: The “calls for Jews to covert to Christianity” headline is more than a little sensationalist; the Great Commission of Christ, to go into all the world and preach the Gospel, is hardly threatening, especially when done correctly through generosity and love. My parents lived and worked in Israel and the West Bank for a Christian organization and they were forbidden to proselytize to Israeli’s. If I recall, the Latter-Day-Saint church  had to come to some agreement with Israel’s government to not go door-to-door talking about Joseph Smith.
